text: Paris Hilton has issued a public apology for claiming President Trump's sexual harassment accusers were just vying for'attention and fame '. In a statement released to US Weekly, the socialite, 36, insisted her comments were taken out of context, and promised to'provide a louder voice for those who may desperately need it'going forward.'I want to apologize for my comments from an interview I did last year,'Paris said.'They were part of a much larger story and I am regretful that they were not delivered in the way I had intended.'Deeply hurt': Paris Hilton has issued a public apology for claiming President Trump's sexual harassment accusers were just vying for'attention and fame'' I was speaking about my own experiences in life and the role of media
